instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-4924 no image and no backlight
threads.message:
820-4942 water damaged
no image no backlight 
there is image on the external screen
the water damage was in the backside of J8300, on U5620, U8330 ...
I found a broken trace on J8300:3 I did a jumper. 
PP5VR3V3_SW_LCD_UF 0v
I replaced u8300.
with no result

threads.title: 820-4924 no image and no backlight
threads.message:
Do you have 3V at pin 5 of J8300?

There should still be traces, solders, or some corroded resistors.
Image should appear before backlight.

threads.title: 820-4924 no image and no backlight
threads.message: done, I found 3 broken traces. thanks
